hide_post.description: Text to display for the link that hides a post.

settings_pass.description: Shown when the settings successfully saved.

settings_fail.description: Shown when the settings failed to save.

export_desc.message: Save below data to a text file. Format is JSON. Each number represents an original post ID.

import_desc.message: Expted data format is JSON. Post IDs should be integers within a singal dimension array. If having issues, compare to export data or validated data.

import_pass.message:
Data has been imported.
($added$ IDs added) ($skipped$ IDs skipped)
import_pass.description: Shown when the user tries to import data from the options page. If no problems, this is shown.

import_fail.description: Shown when the user tries to import data from the options page. If there are problems, this is shown.

disclaimer.message:
